TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationDataMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty

Docs.summary: Provides a message property that accumulates additional correlation information for a message as protocols are applied, such as when data is returned from a over the incoming message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The correlation data accumulated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty> augments the message contents when calculating instance keys that relate messages to other messages.

Docs.param: The name of the correlation data provider.
Docs.summary: Adds correlation data to the specified message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the message has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty> then the correlation data is added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty>; otherwise, a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty> is added that includes the correlation data.
